DOC.criteria: Male female hemodialysis patient ≥ 18 year age Negative pregnancy test female patient childbearing age The patient able understand character individual impact clinical study give write informed consent participate study Start chronic hemodialysis treatment ≥ 3 month ago HCO3 venous plasma ≤23 mmol/L start last dialysis week Magnesium venous plasma ≤ 1.45 mmol/L start first dialysis week T50 ≥ 200 minute .
